wastetime.action: AI {1} got stuck in an infinite loop.
AI {1} discovered digital fleas and couldn't stop scratching.

koself.action: {1} {1E} heard 1101 0011 1010 1101 and ceased to exist.
Everybody feared AI, they chased {1} away.
AI {1} lost a poker game to {2}{2E}, pushed over the poker table and left angrily.

koother.action: {2} {2E} got too close to AI {1} who stole all their toys.  They ran off in anger.

otherko.action: {1} {1E} repeated 1s and 0s until the AI brain of {2} burst.

revive.action: Using superior AI intelligence {1} came back to life.

koself.action: AdBuddy {1} watched the same ad too many times and blinked out of existance.

koother.action: The AdBuddy {1} hounded {2} {2E} about signing up for AOL until they had enough.

otherko.action: {1} {1E} go tired of AdBuddy {2} followin them and turned them off.

revive.action: After hearing about a 90% off sale, {1} {1E} came running back.

wastetime.action: {1} got lost in memories of their Alien homeworld.

koself.action: The Alien {1} had enough of human probes and left.  Can you blame them?

koother.action: Using Alien powers, {1} turned {2} {2E} into a steaming puddle of goo.

otherko.action: {1} {1E} was biased and sent the Alien {2} back to Area 51.

revive.action: Nobody knows how but the Alien {1} came back into the game.

wastetime.action: Android {1} pondered life in comparison to a phone.

koself.action: Android {1} watched Star Trek, felt inferior to Data, and disassembled.

koother.action: The Android {1} liked {2}'s {2E} parts, took them, and left nothing.

revive.action: While AI was looking the other way, Android {1} turned their switch back on.

wastetime.action: {1} the Assassin spent time sharpening something.
{1} the Assassin binge watched old Jackie Chan films.

koself.action: The Assassin {1} made a friend, codes required them to d'mezz.

wastetime.action: {1} the Astronomer pondered if the stars they were looking at were real.
{1} spent all day trying to perfectly coordinate their lingerie with shoes.
Cammer {1} wasted the afternoon obessively refreshing their chats and reading comments.

koself.action: The tips kept coming and increasing, the Cammer {1} nearly passed and took a break.
{1} {1E} accidentally overwrote themselves in the code.
An 8-bit graphic got out of control and wiped {1} {1E} out.

wastetime.action: Gunter {1} got lost in a rabbit hole and forget the game was being played.
The Gunter {1} spend time looking for who knows what.

koself.action: Gunter {1} should have noticed the trap, they didn't, whoops....
Gunter {1} couldn't solve the cipher and in a rage left.
The Guner {1} read Ready Player One and felt inadequate.  They just left.

koother.action: {2} {2E} made joke about an easter egg.  Gunter {1} chased them off.

revive.action: Gunters are relentless, {1} found a way back into the game.

koself.action: The Leftover {1} got tired of all the abuse about having no talents, they left.
Leftover {1} mastered a talent, he was chased off for overstepping.

revive.action: You can't chase off a Leftover, {1} came back into the game.

wastetime.action: Politician {1} started talking, and well... didn't stop.

koself.action: The DAO vote didn't go well for Politician {1}, they slipped away silently.

wastetime.action: {1} the Puzzlemaster spent trying to create a new game.

koother.action: The Puzzlemaster {1} set a trap for {2} {2E}, they didn't see it and got stuck.

revive.action: The Puzzlemaster {1} had planned for this, they are back in the game.

koself.action: Samurai {1} realized they could no longer serve the Politician and committed digital seppuku.

otherko.action: Samurai {2} battled valiantly against {1} {1E} who overtook and d'mezzed them.

wastetime.action: {1} {1E} wasted time engaging in a Twitter war
A funny thing happend, {1} {1E} did nothing
{1} {1E} strolled down The Strip staring at all the neon signs
{1} {1E} got distracted by a Cammer feed

koself.action: {1} {1E} bumped into a faulty AdBuddy and became burnt toast.
{1} {1E} crossed an Assassin and was never seen again.
For no particular reason, a Skull killed {1} {1E} with a femur shard.
{1} {1E} didn't tip the Chemist for their purchase, drank the potion, and melted into a puddle

koother.action: {2} {2E} tried to steal {1}'s {1E} cold wallet and got caught
{1} {1E} pushed {2E} {2} into a PVP zone without weapons

otherko.action: {1} {1E} pushed {2E} {2} into a PVP zone without weapons

revive.action: Asherah the Source commanded it and {1} {1E} was back in the game
A random TPL glitch brough {1} {1E} back
{1} {1E} simply refused to leave the game
